# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width = 10)
    lines = []
    current_line = ""
    
    for word in split(text, r"\s+"))
        if endof(current_line) + sizeof(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = string(word)
        else
            current_line *= " " * word
        end
    end
    
    # Add the last line
    push!(lines, current_line)
    
    return join(lines, "\n")
end

# Example usage:
text = """
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
Phasellus vitae faucibus risus. Integer at libero ut nisl ultrices.
"""

wrapped_text = wrap_string(text, text_width = 30)
println(wrapped_text)
